hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime Liquidity Breakout for Mid-Caps
hypothesis_content.statement: In a NEUTRAL regime, a simultaneous breakout in both price (+5% from 20-day low) and liquidity (order book depth +10% from 5-day avg) for a mid-cap asset (e.g., GRT, BAT, CRV) will lead to a sustained 7-day trend, outperforming the crypto market cap weighted index.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral, range-bound markets, coordinated moves in price AND liquidity are rare and often signal a fundamental shift in market maker support or institutional accumulation, providing a higher-confidence trend initiation signal.
entry_conditions: Market regime == NEUTRAL (as per primary model)
Asset (e.g., GRT) price rallies 5%+ from its 20-day low
Same asset's USDT pair order book depth expands 10%+ above its 5-day average on the rally day

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7 days after entry, or asset vs Crypto Index (e.g., TOTALCAP) ratio gains 9%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Asset vs Crypto Index ratio drops 4%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If the median 7-day performance of assets meeting both price and liquidity breakout criteria fails to beat the crypto market index.
